# Welcome {.unnumbered .unlisted}

Welcome to the Part *Geocomputation* in the Course *GIScience and Geodatabases*. This course is taught in the Bachelor Degree [Applied Digital Life Sciences](https://www.zhaw.ch/en/lsfm/studies/bachelor/applied-digital-life-sciences/) at the Zurich University of Applied Sciences (ZHAW).
